ok, this is the last attempt at soliciting opinions for reviews of 
built-in scenarios.  Reviewing the 1st three would be nice.

Note: I will have to work out a calendar schedule of some sort to keep 
this list active with topics.

When the gladiator tournament happens (and it will happen), hopefully 
that should super-charge this area would topics.  (I can imagine a few 
people complaining that if a certain thing was changed, he/she could 
have won the tournament.)
